entry.title: Black Hat Python: Infinite possibilities with the Scapy Module
entry.summary:
Today I'm talking about one of my favorites libraries in Python: scapy. We will be seeing things like: how to make a traceroute tool, how to still plain text email data, how to ARP poison a machine, how to process PCAP files,... There are som many possibilities!

This post is based on a chapter from the Black Hat Python book and some of my CTF scripts. Let's the game begin!

Creating a Traceroute Tool

Stealing Emails Credentials

ARP Cache Poisoning

PCAP Processing

Further References:

  • Scapy Documentation.
  • Wifitap: PoC for communication over WiFi networks using traffic injection.
  • Black Hat Python.
  • My Gray hat repo.
